name: Goodmorning & Goodnight Shirt
description: It's finally here! The Goodmorning & Goodnight shirt. It's 3-color premium ink on American Apparel's TR401 Tri-blend Tri-coffee colored shirts. Most printed t-shirts are heavy, beefy, and bulky. American Apparel shirts (what these are printed on) are very soft, and these Tri-blend tees feel amazing. Here's some sizing info in case you're not used to AA: Men's | Women's I decided not to just go with the boring 'ol "logo in the middle" shirt and hopefully made it something that more people would want to wear. Only 50 shirts for the first run! Please allow 2-3 weeks for receipt of your order. Also, international shipping is available :)

name: Custom Print - Small
description: Choose any image from my photostream! http://www.flickr.com/photos/basheertome/ Make sure to include the image title in the notes when you check out by clicking "Add special instructions to merchant". This is a 5"x7" print on matte finish Kodak E-Surface Paper and a small white border. Sorry, it comes without a frame due to shipping being ridiculous for that. Also note that in order to avoid cropping, there will be a small bit extra amount of white space at the top and bottom of the photo. Please allow 1-2 weeks for receipt of your order.
